main event: A UFO sighting was reported in San Francisco, California on March 18, 1955, involving a round pinkish-orange object observed crossing the night sky.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a basketball and was observed for approximately twenty seconds,The sighting took place in foggy weather conditions at night,An air policeman woke up his colleagues to witness the strange object, which resembled a ball of fire about 15-20 feet in diameter,The object changed color from bright yellow to reddish and hovered for a few minutes before taking off at high speed.
witness description: The witnesses included air policemen on guard duty who reported similar observations of the object.
